affiliation_name: Westchester New York Aesthetic Plastic Surgery
overview:
Dr. Mordcai Blau is one of the top cosmetic surgery practitioners in the country.

Certified by the American Board of Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery, Dr. Blau specializes in cosmetic surgery procedures such as breast augmentation, breast reduction (for gynecomastia), liposuction, rhinoplasty, and more.

Dr. Blau received his medical degree from the University of Tel-Aviv in 1973. He then completed his internship and residency in General Surgery at Albert Einstein Medical School in New York. He also spent time teaching medical students in the anatomy labs of both Albert Einstein Medical College and the New York Medical College.

Dr. Blau performs most of his practice in his JCAHO-accredited office-facility in White Plains, New York. He is also affiliated with the reputed White Plains Hospital.

A comprehensive list of his services are available at http://www.cosmetic-md.com/.
